14
15#ifndef ISC_COMMANDLINE_H
16#define ISC_COMMANDLINE_H 1
17
18/*! \file isc/commandline.h */
19
20#include <stdbool.h>
21
22#include <isc/lang.h>
23#include <isc/platform.h>
24#include <isc/result.h>
25
26/*% Index into parent argv vector. */
27LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA extern int isc_commandline_index;
28/*% Character checked for validity. */
29LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA extern int isc_commandline_option;
30/*% Argument associated with option. */
31LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA extern char *isc_commandline_argument;
32/*% For printing error messages. */
33LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA extern char *isc_commandline_progname;
34/*% Print error message. */
35LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA extern bool isc_commandline_errprint;
36/*% Reset getopt. */
37LIBISC_EXTERNAL_DATA extern bool isc_commandline_reset;
38
39ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
40
41int
42isc_commandline_parse(int argc, char * const *argv, const char *options);
43/*%<
44 * Parse a command line (similar to getopt())
45 */
46
47isc_result_t
48isc_commandline_strtoargv(isc_mem_t *mctx, char *s, unsigned int *argcp,
49 char ***argvp, unsigned int n);
50/*%<
51 * Tokenize the string "s" into whitespace-separated words,
52 * returning the number of words in '*argcp' and an array
53 * of pointers to the words in '*argvp'. The caller
54 * must free the array using isc_mem_free(). The string
55 * is modified in-place.
56 */
57
58ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
59
60#endif /* ISC_COMMANDLINE_H */
61
